values: If someone is clumsy, then they are awkward in handling things.
The businessman was clumsy and dropped his work files.
adj. awkward or inefficient in use or construction 笨拙的
adj. 笨拙的 笨拙地 不得当的 不得当地
adj. 笨拙的

adj. 笨拙的, 笨重的

比较级:  
clumsier, clumsiest 

副 词:  
clumsily

名 词:  
clumsiness
awkward, lacking coordination, not graceful, not dextrous
